snippet: Finance officials from the world’s largest economies warned that efforts to deal with debt troubles in Europe and the United States must be balanced with actions to spur the global economy.
abstract: Group of Twenty finance officials meeting in Mexico City warn that efforts to deal with debt troubles in Europe and United States must be balanced with actions to spur global economy.
lead_paragraph: Finance officials from the world’s largest economies warned that efforts to deal with debt troubles in Europe and the United States must be balanced with actions to spur the global economy.

headline.seo: G-20 Leaders Urge Balance for Growth
